name: Meteorite Crash
description:
Meteorite Crash is a my first 2d game(made in unity) that I released on play store maybe a little bit too early so I am currently working on an update.

Basically, in the features that are currently available in the game, you have to protect the earth from meteorites and the more meteorites you block, the more your score increases.

      

In the future version I will add:

-Sound effect;

 -A total of 3 game mod;

 -Probably a shop where you unlock skins and abilities.

Anyways thanks for tryng my game and please support my work. As I said before this my first game and I am 14 so don't hesitate on sending feedback, bugs reports or simple game ideas that I could make in the future.
